name: Cyber Dragon: Yokai Cycle
description:
Long ago the great dragon spirit Pendi watched over humanity with his elemental magic. With peerless mastery of Ice, Fire, and Earth, he held peace and warded mankind from dangers of the tumultuous world. As time passed and the land matured, humans became less and less dependent on their ancient guardian. Finally, as peace dawned, there came a day the dragon was finally able to rest. He entered a great sleep, only to arise if his people ever truly needed him again. 

While he slept, humanity grew, peace waned, and evil festered...

Centuries later, the dragon spirit awakens to the rampant mischief of Yōkai in the mortal world. Pendi must adapt to the world of glass and steel to save his people once more...

CONTROLS

  • Use WASD to move
  • Use spacebar to shoot
  • Reload and change ammo types by using the mouse to link nodes of the same color
  • Use the right ammo type for each enemy
  • Jammer enemies will distort your ammo loading panel

Made by GooseRocketGames

The font used for the game (for the HUD elements and game over text) was taken from 1001fonts.com, a royalty free fonts website. All other art and music assets were made during the jam.
